org.pebble.core.decoding

Class PebbleBytesStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pebble.core.decoding.PebbleBytesStore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BytesArrayPebbleBytesStore

    public abstract class PebbleBytesStore
extends Object
    Abstract class of Pebble's compressed data store. Abstracts the specifics on how the compressed data is stored and retrieved, adding flexibility in the way the compressed data is handled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PebbleBytesStore() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract byte[] get(int listIndex)
      Gets the bytes array which contains the data of the compressed list associated with listIndex.
      it.unimi.dsi.io.InputBitStream getInputBitStream(int listIndex)
      Returns bits input stream that contains the compressed list of the given index listIndex with the cursor positioned on the beginning of the representation.
      protected abstract long offset(int listIndex)
      Gets the offset in bits where the compressed list associated with listIndex starts.

        public it.unimi.dsi.io.InputBitStream getInputBitStream(int listIndex)
                                                 throws IOException
        Returns bits input stream that contains the compressed list of the given index listIndex with the cursor positioned on the beginning of the representation.
        Parameters:
        listIndex - index of list.
        Returns:
        bits input stream that contains the compressed list of the given index listIndex with the cursor positioned on the beginning of the representation.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case there is an exception positioning the cursor in the beginning of the representation.
